REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0940 reute r f BC-GULF-APPLIED-<GATS>-S 02-26 0055

TEXT.TITLE: GULF APPLIED <GATS> SELLS UNITS, SEES GAIN
TEXT.BODY: Gulf Applied Technologies Inc said it sold its pipeline and terminal operations units for 12.2 mln dlrs and will record a gain of 2.9 mln dlrs in the first quarter. It added that any federal taxes owed on the transaction will be offset by operating loss carryovers. Reuter
